```{r}
##### LOAD PACKAGES
library("tidyverse")
library("modelsummary")
library("kableExtra")
library("gt")
library("shiny")

```

```{r}
##### LOAD DATASET

PFAS_AD <-read_csv("C:/Users/jarva/Desktop/James-Todd Lab/PFASandAdiposity/Data/PFAS_AD.csv")
```
